description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The popular Freaky Creatures pet 'Penga' makes an appearance in his very own mini game, Penga's Peril. Guide Penga through 50 mind twisting levels filled with challenges, teleports and Puff Puff!
description.short: The popular Freaky Creatures pet 'Penga' makes an appearance in his very own mini game, Penga's Peril. Guide Penga through 50 mind twisting levels filled with challenges, teleports and Puff Puff!
